Song.title: Your Presence Is Heaven to Me
Song.copyright: Israel Houghton | Micah Massey © 2012 Integrity's Praise! Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing) Sound Of The New Breed

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [Bm7]Who is like You L[G]ord in all the ea[D]rth Ma[Bm7]tchless love and b[G]eauty endless w[D]orth For n[Bm7]othing in this wo[G]rld can satis[D]fy [Bm7]Jesus You're the c[G]up that won't run d[D]ry
Chorus: Your [Asus]prese[A2]nce is he[G]aven to m[D]e Your [Asus]prese[A2]nce is he[G]aven to m[D]e
Verse 2: [Bm7]Treasure of my h[G]eart and of my s[D]oul [Bm7]In my weakness Y[G]ou are merci[D]ful Red[Bm7]eemer of my p[G]ast and present wr[D]ong [Bm7]Holder of my fu[G]ture days to c[D]ome
Chorus: Your [Asus]prese[A2]nce is he[G]aven to m[D]e Your [Asus]prese[A2]nce is he[G]aven to m[G A/G G A/G (To Bridge)]e
{new_page} BRIDGE: [D2]Oh Jesus [Bm11]oh Jesus [A2] Your pre[G]sence is heaven to me [D2]Oh Jesus [Bm11]oh Jesus [A2] Your pre[G]sence is heaven to me
Verse 3: [Bm7]All my days on ea[G]rth I will aw[D]ait The m[Bm7]oment that I s[G]ee You face to f[D]ace For n[Bm7]othing in this w[G]orld can satis[D]fy [Bm7]Jesus You're the c[G]up that won't run d[D]ry
ENDING: Your pre[G]sence is heaven to me Your pre[G]sence is heaven to me
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 who is like you lord in all the earth matchless love and beauty endless worth for nothing in this world can satisfy jesus youre the cup that wont run dry chorus your presence is heaven to me your presence is heaven to me verse 2 treasure of my heart and of my soul in my weakness you are merciful redeemer of my past and present wrong holder of my future days to come chorus your presence is heaven to me your presence is heaven to me bridge oh jesus oh jesus your presence is heaven to me oh jesus oh jesus your presence is heaven to me verse 3 all my days on earth i will await the moment that i see you face to face for nothing in this world can satisfy jesus youre the cup that wont run dry ending your presence is heaven to me your presence is heaven to me

Chorus: Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Gmaj6]life to m[Asus A]e
Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Asus]life to m[D]e [Asus A]

Arrangement.description: Medley with "Whom Have I in Heaven
